sentences.en: Currently, dentists have a bevy of indirect restorative materials at their disposal.
sentences.cn: 通常牙医会有几种间接修复材料可以选择.

sentences.en: Like many areas of dentistry, aesthetic indirect restorative materials have improved significantly in the last decade.
sentences.cn: 象牙科其他许多范畴一样,再过去十多年间, 美学间接修复资料有了很大的提高.

sentences.en: Nature has an exhilarative and restorative effect.
sentences.cn: 大自然具有使人畅快并恢复体力的效果.
大自然使人心神愉快并能恢复体力.

sentences.en: Objective To estimate the effect of restorative treatment on conserving posterior crown fracture tooth.
sentences.cn: 目的:评估用修复的方法保存后牙牙冠纵裂牙齿的效果.

sentences.en: Objective To seartch for the best restorative procedure in the majority anodontia of posterior tooth.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨后牙大部分缺损的最佳修复方式.

sentences.en: Polymethylmethacrylate ( PMMA ) bone cement has been as a restorative meterial in bone restoration and hard tissue replacement.
sentences.cn: 聚甲基 丙烯酸甲酯 骨水泥作为骨修复材料在骨修复和硬组织置换中发挥着重要作用.

sentences.en: Post - core - crown is a widely used restorative method in clinic.
sentences.cn: 桩核冠修复是临床上应用非常广泛的修复方法.

sentences.en: Seven days off could be a wonderful restorative.
sentences.cn: 休假7天肯定能让人精神焕发。

sentences.en: She opened the door to her bedroom, thinking how restorative a hot bath would feel tonight.
sentences.cn: 她打开了卧室的门，想着今晚洗个热水澡将会是多么惬意的事啊。

sentences.en: The adhesion of plaque on dental restorative between gallium alloy and amalgarn alloy were compared.
sentences.cn: 摘要本文比较了镓合金与银汞合金两种牙体修复材料的耐磨性、腐蚀性及菌斑附著情况.

sentences.en: The brandy acted as a restorative.
sentences.cn: 喝白兰地酒消除了疲劳.

sentences.en: The fruit wine was nutritious and restorative, with low alcohol content.
sentences.cn: 该酒酒精度低,营养丰富, 具有饮用滋补双重作用.

sentences.en: the restorative power of fresh air
The writer thinks that restorative justice forms the value basis & Victim - Offender Mediation oppositetotraditional retribution justice.
sentences.cn: 笔者认为,与传统的报应正义相对应,恢复正义构成刑事和解的价值基础.

sentences.en: With steady gaze he awaited confidently the moment for administering the restorative.
sentences.cn: 他眼睛一眨不眨地等待着那施用救命药水的时机的到来.

words.tran_cn: 恢复；复位；王政复辟；归还
修补者；[计] 复位器；[计] 恢复设备；修建者
滋补的，有助于复元的；[医]恢复健康的

trans.tran_cn: 有恢复健康作用的，滋补的
trans.tran_en: Something that is restorative makes you feel healthier, stronger, or more cheerful after you have been feeling tired, weak, or miserable
